entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:49 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peawanuck Airport 5:57 PM CST Friday 17 February 2023

Pressure: 100.0 kPa

Humidity: 83 %

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this evening then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 31 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 31. Wind chill near minus 40. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023
